descs: We humans have a penchant for homeostasis. We want to go back to norma
"The capitalist pig waits for the world to burn only to pick up what didn’t catch fire and sells it at the price of gold."
One of the prime observations from the current pandemic is that even the developed nations failed to keep themselves alienated and safe from the disaster.
